name: escape the lab (itch) (JentGent)
description:
This is an endless side scroller. Fly around a flock of monster things with your cursor, eat scientists, and avoid traps. Click to split into smaller clones of yourself.

This is my second game jam entry https://itch.io/jam/scorejam16
Still haven't learned how to use any game engines ..... just made it in html5 + javascript with p5.js again and howler.js for sound, which means I had to code the physics engine myself, so please don't mind if stuff is glitchy
Oh, and I don't know how to make online leaderboards, and I don't want to deal with it, so I just save the high score locally.

I made the art in Microsoft Paint 3D (hence the brilliantly gorgeous graphics) 
I also made the music in FL Studio 
I got all the sound effects from https://freesound.org
